characters: Two individuals on scooters, one individual on a bicycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Two individuals on scooters and one individual on a bicycle are visible on the right side of the road. The individuals on scooters are wearing yellow and blue clothing, respectively. The individual on the bicycle is wearing a white shirt and blue pants. The road ahead is clear, and the vehicle is maintaining a steady speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed and keeping a safe distance from the scooters and bicycle on the right side. The vehicle is driving straight without any sudden changes in direction or speed.
key_objects: 1) Right side: Two individuals on scooters, approximately 2-3 meters away, moving forward at a steady pace. 2) Right side: One individual on a bicycle, approximately 2-3 meters away, moving forward at a steady pace.
